simple.annotation: A reference to a GFX instance that indicates the icon of this Relic.
A reference to a sound instance that indicates the sound to be played for activation.

complex.annotation: A block of Conditions that determines can this relic be activated.

simple.annotation: An integer of victory score should this Relic count.

complex.annotation: An Economy Unit that determines the resource output and activation cost.

simple.annotation: An integer of days for this Relic to "shine" if itâ€™s activated.

list.annotation: A block of Effects for the Activation Effect of this relic.

complex.annotation: A block of Modifiers for the Passive Effect of this relic.
A block of Conditions that determines should the modifier apply. Vanilla relics always have 'always = yes'. It is unclear if relics have country_modifier.
Determines how likely the AI will activate this relic

simple.annotation: A localisation key (triggered event desc) that designates the description of this site (scope = site).
A reference to a GFX instance (sprite key) that indicates the picture of this site.

complex.annotation: A Trigger block (conditions) that determines if a scope (fleet) is potential to excavate this archaeological site (from = site, this will add/remove this option without giving the player a reason).

A Trigger block (conditions) that determines can a ship delve into this site (scope = fleet, from = site). All vanilla sites are only open to Science Ships with a Scientist (this will toggle enable/disabled mode on buttons etc).
A Trigger block (conditions) that determines can an empire see this site (scope = country, from = site).

simple.annotation: An integer of max stages of this site. It must be exactly match the number of state blocks of this site.
An integer of max stages instances of this type a galaxy can have, only checked when using 'create_archaeological_site = random'

complex.annotation: A scriptable value used for random weight, only used when using 'create_archaeological_site = random'. Scriptable value type is defined either by an integer or 'mean time to happen'.
Defines a stage of this site, order dependent
A 'min max interval type', interval is defined either by an integer or '{ min = [int] max=[int] }' where the later will randomize a value between min and max.

simple.annotation: A reference to a GFX instance (rune icon gfx type) that indicates the picture of this stage.
An 'fleet_event' id to trigger on the delver fleet when this stage is cleared. A fleet is a 'container' of ships and can consist of one or more ships

list.annotation: An Effect block to be executed when a roll is failed (scope = fleet, from = site).
An Effect block to be executed upon site creation (scope = site).
An Effect block to be executed upon site visible (scope = country, from = site).
